select id, org_casNo, jyqtfy, jylx, jybj, jyznf, jy_type, jyje, product_type, jjh, csr, csjd, fprq, area_center, accept_city, hth, dqsyb_yj, dqsyb_ej, wbqs, wbjb, warq, cur_name, khjlxm, sjrq, sfwbcs, sfjq, bywa, ajhsrq, xfjrzh, tzsx, tzje, zhzt, hkrq, hksyqqs, hkje, yqcplx, yqjd, quota_product, org_id, jazt, create_by, create_time from cur_assets_repayment_package
mapper.select: select t.month,count(t.month) as total from( select DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m') as month, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y')as year from cur_assets_package ) t where t.year = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') GROUP BY t.month order by t.month

select t.month,count(t.month) as total from( select DATE_FORMAT(max(create_time),'%Y-%m') as month, DATE_FORMAT(max(create_time),'%Y')as year,org_casNo from cur_assets_repayment_package GROUP BY org_casNo ) t where t.year = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') GROUP BY t.month order by t.month

SELECT CAST(sum(t.wa_ye) AS char(20)) AS qkje,'01'as month from( SELECT wa_ye,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%m')as month from cur_assets_package where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') )t WHERE t.month = '01' union ALL SELECT CAST(sum(t.wa_ye) AS char(20)) AS qkje,'02'as month from( SELECT wa_ye,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%m')as month from cur_assets_package where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') )t WHERE t.month = '02' union ALL SELECT CAST(sum(t.wa_ye) AS char(20)) AS qkje,'03'as month from( SELECT wa_ye,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%m')as month from cur_assets_package where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') )t WHERE t.month = '03' union ALL SELECT CAST(sum(t.wa_ye) AS char(20)) AS qkje,'04'as month from( SELECT wa_ye,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%m')as month from cur_assets_package where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') )t WHERE t.month = '04' union ALL SELECT CAST(sum(t.wa_ye) AS char(20)) AS qkje,'05'as month from( SELECT wa_ye,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%m')as month from cur_assets_package where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') )t WHERE t.month = '05' union ALL )t WHERE t.month = '11' union ALL SELECT CAST(sum(t.wa_ye) AS char(20)) AS qkje,'12'as month from( SELECT wa_ye,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%m')as month from cur_assets_package where SELECT CAST(sum(t.hkje) AS char(20))AS hkje,'01'as month from( SELECT hkje,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%m')as month from cur_assets_repayment_package where
